mapper.select: /* IO: insNet.secrtActvy.securityprinting.DU_SecurityPrinting_dmSelectSecurityPrintingDeptList_2017-09-26T10:14:19(2017-12-07T13:56:19) */ SELECT A.ENA_DEPT_ID AS DEPT_ID, B.DEPT_NM AS DEPT_NM FROM SC_DEPT_SEC_EMP A, CO_DEPT B WHERE A.ENA_DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID AND A.SEC_EMP_ID = #{empId} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND b.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.DEPT_ID NOT IN ('10120881', '10120882', '10120813', 'XB20', 'XB21', 'XB22', 'XB23', 'XB24') ORDER BY DEPT_NM ASC
